body:
https://github.com/Z3Prover/z3
* Fixed python dependency to always be required.
`z3` needs `python` for build, and `python` command installed by spack is used in `package.py`. so, I fixed python dependency to always be required.
```
        spec['python'].command('scripts/mk_make.py', *options)
```
And, `--python` option is used to enable bindings with python, so I fixed description about this.

* bugfix about fallthrough annotation.
I got a error because fallthrough annotation was used last case in switch sentence. I fixed it.
Reference: https://github.com/Z3Prover/z3/issues/1016
title: z3: bugfix about python dependency and fallthrough annotation.
